Package controller

package controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    controller.applicant
     
    controller.manager
     
    controller.officer
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AuthenticationService
    Provides authentication and NRIC validation services for all types of users Applicants, Officers, and Managers.
    DataInitializer
    Loads and provides access to all core container lists used in the system, including applicants, officers, managers, projects, and various transactional records.
    FilterMenu
    A controller class that manages user-defined filters (location and flat type) for browsing BTO projects.
    FilterSettings
    Models user-defined filters for browsing BTO projects.
    PasswordOperation
    Utility class for validating password strength and displaying password requirements.
    PasswordService
    Utility service for handling password changes across different types of users.
    RegistrationService
    Handles registration of new applicants in the BTO system.
    UserSession
    A simple session manager for tracking the currently logged-in user during runtime.
